learning_outcomes: Describe index notation.
Change a number in index form to expanded notation and vice versa.
Evaluate numbers in index notation with positive bases and indices.
Describe the intersection, union in a Venn diagram.
Use symbols of intersection "∩", union "U" (and subset "⊂" as recap).
Find number of subsets of a given set using the formula 2ⁿ.
Apply the knowledge of sets in real life situations.
Describe and list prime and composite numbers.
Identify prime factors of given numbers.
Multiply fractions by whole numbers.
Multiply a fraction by another fraction.
Divide fractions by whole numbers.
Divide whole numbers by fractions.
Divide a fraction by another fraction.
Apply fractions to solve problems in real life.
Describe decimal numbers by their names (up to 3 decimal places).
Add and subtract decimal numbers up to 3 decimal places.
Multiply decimal numbers by decimal numbers.
Divide decimal numbers by decimal numbers (up to 3 decimal places (INCLUDING REMAINDER)).
Round off to the nearest unit.
Round off to the nearest decimal places.
Solve simple problems involving rounding off quantities to required number of decimal places.
Describe ratio and direct proportion.
Differentiate between ratio and direct proportion.
Express a given ratio in its lowest term.
Solve problems involving ratio and direct proportion.
Describe cost price, selling price, profit and loss.
Calculate cost price, selling price, profit and loss.
Calculate simple interest, discount, and profit and loss percentage.
Carry out calculations involving transportation.
Describe averages or measures of central tendency.
Solve problems involving averages.
Describe an open sentences.
Solve linear equations in one variable.
Identify regular polygons up to six sides.
Draw pentagon and hexagon.
Find the total length of edges of cube and cuboid.
Find the total surface area of cube and cuboid.
Describe the meaning of speed.
Calculate speed using distance and time.
